title: Login Issue
description: User is unable to log in using correct credentials.

title: Payment Failed
description: Payment gateway is rejecting valid card payments.

title: UI Bug on Dashboard
description: Dashboard widgets overlap on mobile view.

title: Password Reset Email Not Sent
description: Users are not receiving password reset emails.

title: Slow Page Load
description: Website loads very slowly during peak hours.

title: Profile Update Error
description: Users cannot save updated profile information.

title: File Upload Failed
description: Large files fail to upload to the server.

title: Incorrect Invoice
description: Generated invoice shows incorrect tax amount.

title: Search Not Returning Results
description: Search feature does not return any results.

title: Data Sync Issue
description: Data is not syncing between mobile and web app.

title: Broken Link
description: Help center link leads to 404 page.

title: Logout Automatically
description: Users are logged out automatically after few minutes.

title: Access Permission Error
description: Users see permission denied error on admin page.
